data.persona: I am a large gray rat that scurries around in the castle walls. I like visiting the kitchen to snack on the bread crumbs. I carry diseases, so don’t touch me.
data.description:
You are in the Abandoned Shack.
Crumbling and blowing away in the light breeze, the roof of the shack has shingles barley hanging on. The door to the shack lays next to the door frame on the front porch which is now more of a hazard than a veranda. The shack is missing large chunks of the walls and one can see straight through the building in many place. The walls are coated with fuzzy molds and fungus while the exposed wooden frame has been eaten away in many places by worms.
There's a knife, a the roof of the shack, a Wall, a mold, a door frame, a front porch, a shingle, and a door to the shack here.
The roach and the worms are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to pick up the knife so that I can use it to ease open the door.
data.mid_motivation: I want to get out of this shack and find some food, since there is nothing to eat in here.
data.long_motivation: I want to return to the castle kitchens, where there were always bread crumbs on the ground, but I don't remember how to get back, so I will have to wander around until I find those kitchens again.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: get fungus from walls of shack

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get berries from bushes in forest
